ygData.subject: RE: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have only seen stats for Lambent Bracer and Greaves, and I must say they sound pretty nice for mid-levels.  Some of the Imbrued Plate PoF armor pieces do

> > last night the
> > leader informed me they had acquired the components necessary for a
> > breastplate. I've been dying to find a new set of armor that
> > doesn't make
> > me look like C-3PO with a hatchet, and it couldn't get much

> > Athren Notechaser, little blue-boy to be

I have only seen stats for Lambent Bracer and Greaves, and I must say they
sound pretty nice for mid-levels. Some of the Imbrued Plate PoF armor
pieces do have questionable stat raises so these might be a nice alternative
(come on now, +5 WIS on Imbrued gauntlets??? I'm keeping them though, just
in case Verant decides to change things) =)

I'd like to ask an opinion: I have a Hero bracer (AC9, +10 STR, +something
disease or poison), and a Serpentine Bracer (AC1, +3 DEX, +9 AGI). Should I
stick with the Serpentine or go with a Lambent (AC9, +1 CHA, +4 STR)?

Also debating on going with Lambent Greaves (AC13, +1 CHA, +5 AGI) or
sticking with Mithril (AC10, +7 STR, +5 vs Magic). Nice AC on the Lambent,
but I like the stat and MR buff on mithril.

Currently stats are: STR 131, DEX 129 (or close to it), AGI 144, CHA 104.

Does anyone have stats on the other Lambent pieces?

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
